titleStmt.title: Ultima, = the last things in reference to the first and middle things: or certain meditations on life, death, judgement, hell, right purgatory, and heaven: delivered by Isaac Ambrose, minister of the Gospel at Preston in Amoundernes in Lancashire.
Prima, media, & ultima. Ultima.
titleStmt.author: Ambrose, Isaac, 1604-1664.

titleStmt.title: Ultima, = the last things in reference to the first and middle things: or certain meditations on life, death, judgement, hell, right purgatory, and heaven: delivered by Isaac Ambrose, minister of the Gospel at Preston in Amoundernes in Lancashire.
Prima, media, & ultima. Ultima.
titleStmt.author: Ambrose, Isaac, 1604-1664.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J.A. and are to be sold by Nathanael Webb, and William Grantham, at the Grey-hound in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Also issued as part of Wing A2961 and various editions of "Media".
Identified as part of Wing A2961 (reel 1787) and as Wing A2970 (reel 1348).
Reproductions of the originals in the Harvard University Library(reel 1348) and in the St. John's College Library, Cambridge University (reel 1787).
